column4: Hi question, I'm having trouble with Ibus, I have the Japanese Language set up, however I can only get the higrina to show up and can't get the katakana to show up at all.
I have I-Bus set up to use Japanese however it will only show Higrina, Katakana or Kanji Will not show up at all when I press space
check it out in ibus perfs
I'm using the right input method the about for anthy says it will convert romanji to higrina, then to Katakana then to Kanji by pressing the spacebar.
